patch 8.2.0624: Vim9: no check for space before #comment

Problem:    Vim9: no check for space before #comment.
Solution:   Add space checks.  Fix :throw with double quoted string.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0624: Vim9: no check for space before #comment · vim/vim@a72cfb8
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0624: Vim9: no check for space before #comment · vim/vim@a72cfb8
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: no check for space before #comment. Solution: Add space checks. Fix :throw with double quoted string.

Solution:   Give error while compiling.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/f93c7fea084a99848d512ff2732041d4b41d93c8|patch 8.2.0626: Vim9: wrong syntax of function in Vim9 script>
patch 8.2.0626: Vim9: wrong syntax of function in Vim9 script

Problem:    Vim9: wrong syntax of function in Vim9 script.
Solution:   Give error for missing space. Implement :echomsg and :echoerr.
            (closes #5670)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0626: Vim9: wrong syntax of function in Vim9 script · vim/vim@f93c7fe
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0626: Vim9: wrong syntax of function in Vim9 script · vim/vim@f93c7fe
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: wrong syntax of function in Vim9 script. Solution: Give error for missing space. Implement :echomsg and :echoerr. (closes #5670)

patch 8.2.0627: Vim9: error message does not work

Problem:    Vim9: error message does not work. (Yegappan Lakshmanan)
Solution:   Swap lines.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/e71ebb46a252cd1cdfb075e6014c2b13c580bf3f|patch 8.2.0628: error in menu translations>
patch 8.2.0628: error in menu translations

Problem:    Error in menu translations.
Solution:   Insert a backslash before a space in one more file. (Shun Bai,
            Emir Sari)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0628: error in menu translations · vim/vim@e71ebb4
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0628: error in menu translations · vim/vim@e71ebb4
attachments.text: Problem: Error in menu translations. Solution: Insert a backslash before a space in one more file. (Shun Bai, Emir Sari)
